dialogueLines.line: Do you know where the Spooky Month festival is?
dialogueLines.speaker: skid

dialogueLines.line: First of all, don't ever call me that.
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: Second, I have no idea what you're talking about.
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: It's the address on this flyer.
dialogueLines.speaker: pump

dialogueLines.line: Can you show us the way?
dialogueLines.speaker: skid

dialogueLines.line: Well, normally I would tell kids like you to scram, but you caught me in a good mood today.
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: Sure, I can point the way, but you'll have to beat me in a song first.
dialogueLines.speaker: dad
